data.prompt: A stormy landscape where jagged cliffs rise against a turbulent sea, shards of glass reflecting flashes of lightning, symbolizing heartbreak and resilience. Dark, brooding clouds loom overhead, while splashes of deep red and electric blue evoke a powerful sense of anguish and energy.

An abstract representation of a shattered heart, fragmented pieces suspended in mid-air, pulsing with a vivid glow against a backdrop of swirling darkness. The intensity of colors—dark purples and vibrant reds—creates a visceral sense of struggle and passion, capturing the emotional turbulence within.

A desolate industrial scene, with an empty metal factory echoing the haunting sound of broken machinery and faint whispers, symbolizing the ghosts of lost love. Rusted beams and dimly lit corners bathe the scene in a moody, muted palette, evoking a powerful contrast between despair and defiance.
